decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( LSD156/03/001, LSD156/03/003 and 836/RDP/P01 received on 4 February 2016 and LSD156/12/012 rev A received on 26 April 2016 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall be those stated on the approved drawings.

Condition : 4 - 4.	The alterations hereby approved shall be undertaken pursuant to or as part of the same building operation as the alterations approved within application reference 01054/83-93/P13, or any variation of condition application that supersedes this approval.
description: Installation of elevational alteration at ground floor level
